# 2025 MAMA Awards

| presenter = Visa
| hosts = Park Bo-gum (Nov 28)Kim Hye-Soo (Nov 29)
| most_wins =
| website = [https://www.mnetplus.world/en/2025mamaawards/ 2025 MAMA Awards]
| network = Mnet, TVING, and global broadcasting partners
| runtime =
| previous = 2024
| main = MAMA
| next =
| sponsor =
}}
The 2025 MAMA Awards will take place on November 28 and 29 at the Kai Tak Stadium in Hong Kong. Actor and singer Park Bo-gum will host the first day of the show, while actress Kim Hye-soo will host the second day. It will be broadcast through Mnet, TVING, and will be livestreamed through HBO Max for the first time.
Background
The ceremony is organized by CJ E&M through its music channel Mnet. The theme for the 27th edition of the show is "Hear My Roar: uh-heung," a Korean expression meaning fun or excitement.
Selection process
All songs and albums that are eligible to be nominated must be released from October 1, 2024, to September 30, 2025.

Round 1 voting for Fans' Choice Male & Female started on October 16, 7 PM KST until October 26, 11:59 PM KST. Round 2 voting together with Fans' Choice of the Year is to be conducted from October 30, 6 PM KST until November 10, 11:59 PM KST. Voting for Fans' Choice of the Year will reopen during the live broadcast on November 28.
Performers
The first line-up of performers were announced on October 17. The second line-up were announced on October 20.

Presenters
Park Bo-gum and Kim Hye-soo were announced as the hosts of the ceremony in late October. The line-up of presenters was announced on November 4.
* Park Bo-gum – Main ceremony host (November 28)
* Kim Hye-soo – Main ceremony host (November 29)
* Go Youn-jung
* Noh Sang-hyun
* Roh Yoon-seo
* Park Hyung-sik
* Shin Seung-hun

Winner and nominees
The list of nominees was announced via livestream on October 16, 2025, and voting for Fans' Choice started shortly after. Nominees are listed in alphanumerical order.
